医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
发现与乳腺癌风险相关的新基因由拉瓦尔大学的 Jacques Simard 教授和英国剑桥大学的 Douglas Easton 教授领导的一项大规模国际合作研究发现了与乳腺癌相关的新基因，这些基因最终可能被纳入测试中，以识别女性的乳腺癌风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-genes-linked-to-breast-cancer-risk-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-genes-linked-to-breast-cancer-risk-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e92fe11f-8379-4f9e-8f10-5021c406cf9e Fri, 18 Aug 2023 11:32:00 -0400 New genes linked to breast cancer risk identified
科学家发现与亨廷顿病相关的基因突变的潜在原因科学家们发现了导致亨廷顿舞蹈症 (HD) 等罕见疾病的基因突变的另一个潜在原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Scientists-discover-pottial-cause-of-genic-mutations-linked-to-Huntingtons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Scientists-discover-pottial-cause-of-genic-mutations-linked-to-Huntingtons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75e3caf1-5a0c-48c6-a931-d04180e2d5f9 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 09:25:00 -0400 Scientists discover potential cause of genetic mutations linked to Huntington's disease
COVID-19 大流行不会导致美国人的政治态度发生重大变化传统的理解是，如果某人经历了威胁事件，他们的态度和信念就会改变。一些学者预测，威胁会导致某人在各种问题上变得更加保守，或者态度变得更加极端。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/COVID-19-pandemic-does-not-lead-to-significant-changes-in-Americans-political-attitudes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/COVID-19-pandemic-does-not-lead-to-significant-changes-in-Americans-political-attitudes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f337540-7a54-4d4c-98e2-6480afa69d98 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 09:18:00 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic does not lead to significant changes in Americans' political attitudes
伦敦克利夫兰诊所进行首例增强现实辅助全膝关节置换术伦敦克利夫兰诊所是伦敦第一家借助人工智能和机器学习设计的增强现实手术平台成功实施全膝关节置换手术的医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Cleveland-Clinic-London-performs-first-augmented-reality-assistance-total-knee-replacement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Cleveland-Clinic-London-performs-first-augmented-reality-assistance-total-knee-replacement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4b0ffb4-d924-4d2b-8bf6-8de49fe452f4 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 09:12:00 -0400 Cleveland Clinic London performs first augmented reality-assisted total knee replacement
医疗补助扩大增加了癌症临床试验的参与度Fred Hutchinson 癌症中心、SWOG 统计和数据管理中心以及哥伦比亚大学的研究人员表示，根据《患者保护和平价医疗法案》扩大医疗补助范围，参与公共资助临床试验的医疗补助保险癌症患者数量每年增加 19% 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Medicaid-expansion-increases-cancer-clinical-trial-participation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Medicaid-expansion-increases-cancer-clinical-trial-participation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f52a87b-4808-451b-b7e6-d3357baacae4 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:59:00 -0400 Medicaid expansion increases cancer clinical trial participation
肠道微生物组可能在减肥过程中 DNA 甲基化中发挥作用“我应该服用益生菌吗？”这是科罗拉多大学生物医学信息学系 (DBMI) 助理教授 Maggie Stanislawski 博士经常被问到的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Gut-microbiome-may-play-a-role-in-DNA-methylation-during-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Gut-microbiome-may-play-a-role-in-DNA-methylation-during-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f90d7e0-a1ab-460e-aea4-d3617b0cf198 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:54:00 -0400 Gut microbiome may play a role in DNA methylation during weight loss
加纳和尼日利亚应对炭疽疫情，科学家敦促提供疫苗接种资金在加纳和尼日利亚努力应对炭疽病爆发之际，科学家表示，各国政府必须优先考虑疫苗接种资金，以防止这种疾病在西非重新出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Scientists-urge-vaccination-funding-as-Ghana-and-Nigeria-grapple-with-anthrax-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Scientists-urge-vaccination-funding-as-Ghana-and-Nigeria-grapple-with-anthrax-outbreaks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65225b4a-55a1-495d-a443-7004d08f0174 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:49:00 -0400 Scientists urge vaccination funding as Ghana and Nigeria grapple with anthrax outbreaks
新的人工DNA结构可以靶向并摧毁癌细胞一项新的研究强调了人工 DNA 结构的潜力，当它与抗体结合时，可以指导免疫系统专门针对癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-Artificial-DNA-structs-can-target-and-destroy-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-Artificial-DNA-structs-can-target-and-destroy-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72aa7aed-38f1-470d-a841-bc045bd0a99a Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:42:00 -0400 New artificial DNA structures can target and destroy cancer cells
研究表明，DDNS 技术可以减少检测脊髓灰质炎的时间今天（2023 年 8 月 17 日）在《自然微生物学》杂志上发表的一项新研究“使用嵌套 PCR 和纳米孔测序进行敏感脊髓灰质炎病毒检测：一项前瞻性验证研究”证明，使用 DDNS 检测脊髓灰质炎疫情可以为公共卫生当局节省宝贵的时间和金钱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/DDNS-technique-could-reduce-the-time-to-detect-polio-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/DDNS-technique-could-reduce-the-time-to-detect-polio-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=062ef30f-330f-4550-9b7c-6c8d62cea574 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:30:40 -0400 DDNS technique could reduce the time to detect polio, study shows
大型制药公司的策略让许多美国人买不起药美国制药巨头今年夏天提起诉讼，以阻止联邦政府在药品价格监管方面的首次努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/A-peek-at-Big-Pharmae​​28099s-playbook-that-leaves-many-Americans-unable-to-afford-their-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/A-peek-at-Big-Pharmae​​28099s-playbook-that-leaves-many-Americans-unable-to-afford-their-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1fafd72-8e00-4549-9ca2-10091777ee48 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 08:24:14 -0400 A peek at Big Pharma’s playbook that leaves many Americans unable to afford their drugs
